name: Weapon Proficiency
description: Proficient with Club, Heavy Crossbow, Light Crossbow, Dagger, Quarterstaff.

name: Conjurer
description: You are specialized in the school of Conjuration. You can prepare one additional Conjuration spell per spell level each per day. You gain a +2 bonus to Spellcraft checks to learn spells from this school.

name: Immediate Magic (Ex)
description: (1/2 * level times per day) (immediate) Abrupt Jaunt: You and only you, teleport up to 10 feet.

name: Bonus Skills
description: 4 extra skill points at 1st level and 1 extra skill point at each additional level, since humans are versatile and capable.
